item.title: CVE-2024-32579|2024-04-18T09:27:19.303Z -- GloriaFood -- Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GloriaFood Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Restaurant Menu – Food Ordering System – Table Reservation: from n/a through 2.4.1.
